issue.title: DetailsDialogFragment Java
DetailsDialogFragment xml
issue.body:
`

<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
    tools:context="com.example.akaikarasu.test.DetailsDialogFragment">

```
<!-- TODO: Update blank fragment layout -->

<RelativeLayout
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:layout_gravity="left|top">

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="M"
        android:id="@+id/button2"
        android:layout_marginTop="18dp"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
        android:layout_toStartOf="@+id/button3" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="T"
        android:id="@+id/button3"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button2"
        android:layout_toStartOf="@+id/button4" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="W"
        android:id="@+id/button4"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button3"
        android:layout_toStartOf="@+id/button5" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="T"
        android:id="@+id/button5"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button4"
        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="F"
        android:id="@+id/button6"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button5"
        android:layout_toEndOf="@+id/button5" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="S"
        android:id="@+id/button7"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button6"
        android:layout_toEndOf="@+id/button6" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="45dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Su"
        android:id="@+id/button8"
        android:padding="10dp"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button7"
        android:layout_toEndOf="@+id/button7" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="50dp"
        android:text="Time"
        android:id="@+id/button"
        android:onClick="showTimePickerDialog"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:textSize="20dp"
        android:layout_below="@+id/button2"
        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
        android:layout_marginTop="51dp" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="50dp"
        android:text="Start Date"
        android:id="@+id/buttonStart"
        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
        android:layout_alignStart="@+id/button"
        android:onClick="showDatePickerDialog"
        android:layout_marginBottom="60dp"
        android:gravity="center" />

    <Button
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="50dp"
        android:text="End Date"
        android:id="@+id/buttonEnd"
        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
        android:layout_alignStart="@+id/button"
        android:onClick="showDatePickerDialog"
        android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
        android:gravity="center" />

    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="30dp"
        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium"
        android:text="Span: "
        android:id="@+id/textView"
        android:layout_above="@+id/buttonStart"
        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
        android:gravity="center" />

    <TextView
        android:layout_width="50dp"
        android:layout_height="50dp"
        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge"
        android:text=""
        android:id="@+id/Counter"
        android:layout_below="@+id/button4"
        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
        android:gravity="center" />

</RelativeLayout>
```

</FrameLayout>
`

change theme to holo dark !

issue.title: TimePickerFragment
